name: Pocketbase
shortDescription: A self-hosted server like Firebase, giving you full control over data and authentication. It runs entirely on your own infrastructure.

eventsFunctions.description: The url link to signing up, needs to have "/api/collections/users/records". For example "http://127.0.0.1:8090/api/collections/users/records".
eventsFunctions.name: _CreateUser
eventsFunctions.sentence: Sign Up _PARAM1_ The URL , _PARAM2_ email, _PARAM3_ and password, Add _PARAM4_ after the URL,

parameters.description: Add the API details after the URL
parameters.name: API_details

eventsFunctions.description: The url link to singing in, needs to have "/api/collections/users/auth-with-password". For example "http://127.0.0.1:8090/api/collections/users/auth-with-password".
eventsFunctions.name: _LogIn
eventsFunctions.sentence: Log in _PARAM1_ The URL , _PARAM2_ email, _PARAM3_ and password, Add _PARAM4_ after the URL,

parameters.description: Add the API details after the URL
parameters.name: API_details

eventsFunctions.description: You can only save a variable once. If you later need to change its value, use the Update Data section to update the saved variable instead of saving it again.
eventsFunctions.name: _SaveData
eventsFunctions.sentence: Save data _PARAM1_ URL , _PARAM2_ UserID, _PARAM3_ Save variable

parameters.description: Vairable that needs to be saved
parameters.name: Var

eventsFunctions.description:
Update the value of a previously saved variable. Use this option when you want to change data that has already been saved instead of saving it again.
Include a "/" at the end — otherwise it won’t work.
eventsFunctions.name: _UpdateVariable
eventsFunctions.sentence: Update data _PARAM1_ URL , _PARAM2_ UserID, _PARAM3_ Update data

parameters.description: Vairable that needs to be updated
parameters.name: Var

eventsFunctions.description:
Load a saved data, then use the expression Loaded Data to access it.
Include a "/" at the end — otherwise it won’t work.
eventsFunctions.name: _LoadData

eventsFunctions.description: This is the data retrieved from PocketBase. Assign it to any variable you want.
eventsFunctions.name: _LoadedData

eventsFunctions.description:
Permanently delete the saved data from Pocketbase.                                              
Include a "/" at the end — otherwise it won’t work. (NOTE: Once you delete a user’s data, it cannot be recovered).
eventsFunctions.name: _DeleteData

eventsFunctions.description:
Permanently deletes the user’s account. I strongly suggest deleting the user's data also. Include a "/" at the end — otherwise it won’t work.
(NOTE: Once you delete an account, it cannot be recovered).
eventsFunctions.name: _DeleteUser

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the user is signed in.
eventsFunctions.name: _SignedIn

eventsFunctions.description: Sends an email with a link that allows the user to reset their password.
eventsFunctions.name: _PasswordReset
eventsFunctions.sentence: Password reset _PARAM1_ URL , _PARAM2_ email, Add _PARAM3_ after the URL

parameters.description: Add the API details after the URL
parameters.name: API_details

eventsFunctions.description: Sends an email containing a verification link to confirm your email address.
eventsFunctions.name: _EmailVerification
eventsFunctions.sentence: Email verification _PARAM1_ URL , _PARAM2_ email, Add _PARAM3_ after the URL

parameters.description: Add the API details after the URL
parameters.name: API_details

eventsFunctions.description: Checks whether the user’s email address has been verified. Include a "/" at the end — otherwise it won’t work.
eventsFunctions.name: _CheckIfEmailVerified
eventsFunctions.sentence: Check if email is verified _PARAM1_ URL,  _PARAM2_ UserID

eventsFunctions.description: Checks if the user’s email is verified.
eventsFunctions.name: _EmailVerified

eventsFunctions.description: Logs the user out of their account.
eventsFunctions.name: _LogOut
eventsFunctions.sentence: Are you sure you want to log out? _PARAM1_

parameters.description: Are you sure you want to log out?
parameters.name: Are_you_sure

eventsFunctions.description:
Refreshes the user’s authentication token to keep their session active.
(NOTE: Requires the AdvancedHTTP extension to use this action).
eventsFunctions.name: _RefreshAuthToken
eventsFunctions.sentence: Refresh token _PARAM1_ URL,  current token _PARAM2_, Add _PARAM3_ after the URL

parameters.description: Add the API details after the URL
parameters.name: API_details

eventsFunctions.description:
Sends a verification email to the user’s new address to confirm the change.
(NOTE: Requires the AdvancedHTTP extension to use this action).
eventsFunctions.name: _ChangeEmail
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change email _PARAM1_ URL,  New email _PARAM2_, Token _PARAM3_ , Add _PARAM4_ after the URL

parameters.description: Add the API details after the URL
parameters.name: API_details

eventsFunctions.description: Returns the current PocketBase user access token.
eventsFunctions.name: _Token
